ComicInfo.Summary:
This month, Cheval Noir presents the second chapter in the all-new Moebius epic, The Man from the Ciguri, chapter four of Tree-Heart by Comès, and the concluding chapter of Adieu, Brindavoine by Tardi. Plus David Lynch's The Angriest Dog in the World and Rick Geary's Dorthy Kilgallen Investigates. *Story Titles * The Angriest Dog in the World Tree-Heart Chapter 4 The Man From the Ciguri Chapter 2 Post-Apocalypse Adieu, Brindavoine Chapter 4 Flatland Blues
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-27/4000-35303/
